name: Project-N3310
description:
STORY:

You play as warriror commander, your point is to capture all clone machines using yours clones to make new war base. So in 30xx/xx/xx 04:00 will start the mission with commander [secret info.] which will control clones to defend the planet ownership of his team, as more and better he will do it then more points he will get.

RECOMMENDATION:

Capture clone machines as fast as you can and use produced clones right, don't give enemies kill you, your life more important than clones

Specs:

Hyper-casual arcade/strategy game. In prototype variant

Credits/not self-made assets:

Makai Symphony - Dragon Castle  - Creative commons (CC BY-SA 3.0) license

Ending (for who cares about me/game):

Feel free to speak with me, always want help and will do as I can. If you want help project you can send art, trailers If I'll like, I'll mention you in credits and will be very happy)) So lil story... That jam I choose because didn't have any big results yet, once I tried jam with 3 people and only I made game, once skip bc of parents (I was on secondary building in forest), once I got ill and made bad game, I hope that this game will shoot (or smthng), but who knows maybe not. In details... I started jam with freind, that's was fault I made nothing and he steal my time, so I have only 1,5 days to make game from scratch after that I go to school and father be so bored and he try to spoil my work, so...
